main event: On 2 March 1953, multiple witnesses observed unidentified objects in the sky over Cambria, California, including a brilliant white light and a round, glowing object.
interesting points: The objects observed were described as being much brighter and larger than stars,The duration of the sightings ranged from 3 to 35 minutes,Several witnesses reported visual sightings of objects moving at high speeds and making erratic maneuvers,No sound or exhaust trails were heard or seen during the sightings,The sightings drew attention from the USAF's Project Blue Book and involved multiple military personnel.
sighted object: unidentified glowing objects in the sky
witness description: military personnel including FC1 Ronald E. Hand and A/2C Howard H. Potter Jr.
